channel.title: ~~~~~~~~~~~~PLEASE READ! Linux! SERVER! HELP! ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
channel.description:
HEY thanks for reading my post! ok i host about 8 servers atm using windows XP, and i want to start hosting some more using linux because it takes less memory to run and seems more stable.
Question #1 What version of linux should i use there is: Ubuntu, CentOS, Debian, And Fedora?
Question #2 What Version Of Linux Runs with the least amount of memory on an older computer?
Question #3 What Version of Linux CAN use Java because some Versions cant use java.
